publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-612 David McLetchie: Cost of the Parliament Building—That the Parliament expresses concern at the spiralling costs of the Holyrood Project and agrees to place a financial cap on the entire cost of a new Parliament building in line with previous estimates given to the Parliament by the First Minister in order to ensure plans are set within strict financial guidelines and practical designs. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, David Mundell*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Ben Wallace*, Alex Fergusson*, Mary Scanlon*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Keith Harding*, Bill Aitken*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Miss Annabel Goldie*

S1M-612 David McLetchie: Cost of the Parliament Building—That the Parliament expresses concern at the spiralling costs of the Holyrood Project and agrees to place a financial cap on the entire cost of a new Parliament building in line with previous estimates given to the Parliament by the First Minister in order to ensure plans are set within strict financial guidelines and practical designs. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, David Mundell, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Murray Tosh, Ben Wallace, Alex Fergusson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr Keith Harding, Bill Aitken, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Miss Annabel Goldie
S1M-612 Cost of the Parliament Building (lodged on 1 March 2000) Nick Johnston*

S1M-612 David McLetchie: Cost of the Parliament Building—That the Parliament expresses concern at the spiralling costs of the Holyrood Project and agrees to place a financial cap on the entire cost of a new Parliament building in line with previous estimates given to the Parliament by the First Minister in order to ensure plans are set within strict financial guidelines and practical designs. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, David Mundell, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Murray Tosh, Ben Wallace, Alex Fergusson, Mary Scanlon, Phil Gallie, Mr Keith Harding, Bill Aitken, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Miss Annabel Goldie, Nick Johnston
S1M-612 Cost of the Parliament Building (lodged on 1 March 2000) Mr David Davidson*
